General.Name: Canadian Banc Corp
General.Description: Canadian Banc Corp. is a close-ended equity mutual fund launched by Quadravest Inc. The fund is managed by Quadravest Capital Management Inc. It invests in the public equity markets of Canada. The fund invests in stocks of companies engaged in the banking sector. It benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the S&P TSX Financial Index. The fund was formerly known as Canadian Banc Recovery Corp. Canadian Banc Corp. was formed on May 25, 2005 and is domiciled in Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1K7
